summary: The module implements PREP7 commands for managing the ANSYS MAPDL database, providing functionality to read model data, list database contents, and control entity numbering, along with utility methods for record I/O, integrity verification, data import, offset handling, and numeric comparisons/conversions.
business_intent: To give Python users a programmatic way to interact with the MAPDL preprocessor database, simplifying model data ingestion, inspection, and entity numbering management for simulation preparation.
